name: part_009
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Pekora, La+, Noel, Chloe, Flare, and Polka perform the song 'Nijiiro no Bruegel'.
A special slot machine section on the stage screen with a command to 'Push in the Nousagi Sword'.

subtitles.original: 一緒に飛ばないか？
subtitles.english: Shall we fly together?

subtitles.original: Just Believe 涙で濡れたハネ
subtitles.english: Just Believe, wings wet with tears

subtitles.original: 重くて羽ばたけない日は WISH
subtitles.english: On days too heavy to flap, WISH

subtitles.original: その右手に添えよう
subtitles.english: Let's place it in that right hand

subtitles.original: 描くチカラを
subtitles.english: The power to draw

subtitles.original: 鳥のように はためき合うよ Singing Heart
subtitles.english: Like a bird, we'll flutter together, Singing Heart

subtitles.original: いつの日にか わかる時が来るから
subtitles.english: Because one day, the time to understand will come

subtitles.original: ずっと忘れない
subtitles.english: I'll never forget

subtitles.original: その時には 心のアルカディアに
subtitles.english: At that time, in the Arcadia of your heart

subtitles.original: 笑顔忘れない
subtitles.english: Don't forget the smiles

subtitles.original: 言葉なんていらない
subtitles.english: Words are not needed

subtitles.original: 未知の地平の先
subtitles.english: Beyond the unknown horizon

subtitles.original: 強く 満ちて 繋ぎ 合う
subtitles.english: Strongly, fully, connecting

subtitles.original: ハーモニー舞う 七色の翼
subtitles.english: Harmony dancing, rainbow-colored wings

subtitles.original: そして生きる 今を
subtitles.english: And live the now

subtitles.original: 見たことない明日の先へ
subtitles.english: Beyond the tomorrow never seen before

subtitles.original: Yes Just Believe 千年後の今日も
subtitles.english: Yes Just Believe, a thousand years from now

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わって 歌いたい
subtitles.english: I want to be reborn and sing

subtitles.original: 暖かいよ この温もり
subtitles.english: It's warm, this warmth

subtitles.original: 絶対 離さない
subtitles.english: I'll never let go

subtitles.original: Just Believe 運命なんてない
subtitles.english: Just Believe, there's no such thing as fate

subtitles.original: 物語は 自分にある Jump
subtitles.english: The story is within yourself, Jump

subtitles.original: 逃げ出したくなったら
subtitles.english: When you feel like running away

subtitles.original: 宇宙を見上げよう
subtitles.english: Let's look up at the universe

subtitles.original: 勇気こそが 輝くんだよ Singing Star
subtitles.english: Courage is what shines, Singing Star

subtitles.original: 遥か 星が 音楽となったあの日
subtitles.english: That day far away when the stars became music

subtitles.original: 多分 共に 出会い 響き
subtitles.english: Probably together, meeting, resonating

subtitles.original: 神話の一つとなるように
subtitles.english: To become part of a myth

subtitles.original: 紡いだ 何も 怖くないよ
subtitles.english: Spun together, nothing to be afraid of

subtitles.original: 見たことない世界の果てへ
subtitles.english: To the end of the world never seen before

subtitles.original: Yes Just Believe
subtitles.english: Yes Just Believe

subtitles.original: 神様も知らない
subtitles.english: Even God doesn't know

subtitles.original: ヒカリで 歴史を作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's make history with light

subtitles.original: 不死なるほど 未来照らす
subtitles.english: Illuminating the future enough to be immortal

subtitles.original: 一緒に飛ばないか？
subtitles.english: Shall we fly together?

subtitles.original: Just Believe 涙で濡れたハネ
subtitles.english: Just Believe, wings wet with tears

subtitles.original: 重くて羽ばたけない日は WISH
subtitles.english: On days too heavy to flap, WISH

subtitles.original: 旋律は 溶け合って
subtitles.english: The melodies melt together

subtitles.original: シンフォニーへと
subtitles.english: Into a symphony

subtitles.original: 鳥のように はためき合うよ Singing Heart
subtitles.english: Like a bird, we'll flutter together, Singing Heart

subtitles.original: 虹は架かる すべては夢と共に
subtitles.english: A rainbow will form, all together with dreams

subtitles.original: 野うさぎ剣を押し込め
subtitles.english: Push in the Nousagi Sword

subtitles.original: 行け 疾風のごとく
subtitles.english: Go, like a gale

subtitles.original: 宿命の剣士よ
subtitles.english: O knight of fate

subtitles.original: 闇に紛れて
subtitles.english: Mixing with the darkness

subtitles.original: 何故闘うのか
subtitles.english: Why do you fight?
